title: Weekly Mental Health Discussion Thread
selftext:
Is there anything that you want to get off your chest? Heartbreak, abuse, depression, sorrow, career or education related, behavioural changes? Share it and discuss it here.

You may find someone who has gone through a similar episode and might be able to help/guide you.

Please be civil and maintain Reddiquette while participating or replying/helping out someone.

You can also join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/6V29X7f) to discuss this, we have a separate channel (#wellness) exclusively for this topic.

**If you need support or know someone who does, please Reach Out to Your Nearest Mental Health Specialist**.

* **Helplines**: AASRA: 91-22-27546669 (24 hours)
* **Sneha Foundation**: 91-44-24640050 (24 hours)
* **Vandrevala Foundation for Mental Health**: 1860-2662-345 and 1800-2333-330 (24 hours)
* **iCall**: 9152987821 (Available from Monday to Saturday: 8:00am to 10:00pm)
* **Connecting NGO**: 18002094353 (Available from 12 pm - 8 pm)

**Mental Health Thread is posted every Wednesday morning |** [**Old Threads**](https://www.reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Mental+Discussion&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/1fqd80djw8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=a1c77fa439c6564d49fe03ebbbb17f7912ce8d58
comments: Can anyone recommend me a good Telugu remote/online therapist?
This is my colleague, Taruni. You can book an appointment with her. Here are her details: [https://book.psychonline.in/taruni](https://book.psychonline.in/taruni)

It's tiring to be aware of propaganda and searching for truth constantly these days. We cannot trust any source of "news" anymore, everyone has their own personal motive to peddle twisted narratives. It seems easier to just go with the propaganda rather than going against it. I'm really tired.

I have joined cult fit for 3 months to improve my physical fitness. I loved that they also have a 'Mind' section for improving mindfulness. Would love to know if someone has tried it and found it useful ?
I'm losing my fking mind. Someone send help ASAP else I descend into insanity. My family is utterly careless and toxic to the nth degree. Get me fking outta here, now!

Lol, I need a normal internship, the ones I got, they hire for one role, expect you to know everything and pay pennies :')

Someone help out, 3 months of development experience with React in full stack now
